resources.string: Please grant our permission requests to allow Pitstop app to function.
To communicate with the Pitstop Bluetooth device, we need the permission to access your location. We will not actually use or share your location with others.
Use the Search for Car button to scan for car. Make sure your device is plugged in and ready to go. Below are various location that the OBD plug can be at.
Enter your vehicle\'s mileage and VIN. Below are the various location that the VIN scannerId code can be at.
Access to the camera is needed for barcode detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Access to device location is needed for bluetooth feature and trip tracking

With Pitstop, we deliver the power of service to the convenience of the smartphone. Pitstop provides real-time notifications on recommended services and diagnostic reports, directly to the user\'s smartphone.
Please go to settings to turn your bluetooth on.
Turn on your internet connection in order for us to tell you what\'s going on with your car
Turn your car on in order for the module to send data back to the app
Let\'s be proactive and book your vehicle\'s 1st service appointment today.

Pitstop has calculated an estimated time we believe you will be due for your 1st service appointment.

When your appointment is getting close, we will send you a reminder letting you know whether or not you are due for service.

The power of being connected.

Are you sure you don\'t want to book your 1st service appointment? By booking your tentative appointment you are securing your preferred date and time and creating a on \"vehicle maintenance\" reminder for yourself.

The tires on your vehicle are what keep it rolling. They take a beating from sharp turns, rocks, potholes, changes in temperature and the wear from friction on the road. It\'s time for you to inspect tire pressure and wear. Tires in poor condition can cause other mechanical parts to wear out faster.
Change engine oil and replace engine filter to remove contaminants and prolong the life of your motor.
Visibility is a critical part of safety while driving. Making sure your fluids are topped up and windshield wipers are intact is an important way to make sure your car is safe to drive.

Send an emergency request to the dealership to help you get your vehicle into the shop. Breakdowns are frustrating we are here to help. Be aware of the hours of operation of the dealership, after hours you may need to call a tow truck yourself.
Request for the dealership to coordinate a loaner vehicle or a shuttle to pick you up from your location.
Do you want to add more services in addition to the services already in your dashboard?
Pitstop uses a device that is installed into the diagnostic port of your vehicle which transmits the vehicle\'s engine and sensor data to your phone over bluetooth.
"Pitstop is thoroughly compiling data sources from manufacturers, dealerships, and other vehicles to consistently provide with you with the most accurate information about your vehicle.
Pitstop alerts you when your vehicle is due for service, when there\'s a manufacturing recall, and when there is an issue with your engine.
Email or Password Field are not filled
First and last name are required
Password length must be greater than 8

Update failed. Please contact us at info@getpitstop.io.

During any trip, take note of any turns that you will have to make so that you can prepare in advance by slowing down to get nice, smooth turns - your passengers will thank you.

You have no vehicle health reports
Estimates based on the average \nfuel price in your area
Since your Pitsop device was first installed
6. Do not turn the engine off during the above driving cycle until the very end (no stopping for a coffee in between any step!)
5. Drive the vehicle for at least 20 minutes in stop and go traffic with at least four idle periods (engine running while at a stop).
4. Drive the vehicle for a minimum of 10 minutes at highway speeds (between 90 km/hr and 110 km/hr).
3. Start the engine and before driving it, let it sit and idle to warm it up to normal operating temperature.
2. The vehicle must sit for a minimum 8 hour period, without a start.
1. You must start this process with a fuel level of between ¼ and ¾ full.
Follow the steps below to get your vehicle into an emissions test ready state
Our device was unable to retrieve the information needed to perform an emissions test.

Your Pitstop Device detected a sudden change in the direction of your car’s motion which indicates a sharp turn was made. Whether you were practicing your drifting skills, or taking the on ramp with a smile, we hope everything is well.

Your Pitstop Device detected a sudden change in the direction of your car’s motion which indicates a quick lane change was made. Whether you were practicing your drifting skills, or taking the on ramp with a smile, we hope everything is well.
Whether you\'re on the highway or just local roads, don\'t forget about checking your mirrors and blindspots everytime you change lanes. Happy driving!
Your pitstop device has detected you turned on your engine. Have a safe trip!
Your pitstop device has noted you turned off your engine. Hope you had a safe trip!
We can\'t tell if you\'re just a regular driver or someone from Fast and Furious! Either way, just remember to take extra precaution when accelerating at a high rate.

Uh oh! We\'ve detected your car\'s battery is low which most likely means you won\'t be able to start your car soon. Car batteries usually have a lifespan of about 5-7 years, but that can be shortened by things like weather, driving habits and leaving your accessories on

We have detected that your car\'s engine has been running for over 15 mins and the car has been stationary. Your engine is a powerful machine, don\'t waste its talents! Letting your engine idle can potentially lead to its components undergoing wear unnecessarily and can also lead to poor fuel economy.

Your Pitstop device has taken note that you have been driving your car for 4 consecutive hours or more. We understand how fun road trips can be, but driving for extended periods of time can be cause for concern.
This is just a friendly reminder to drive extra cautiously when driving at a speed greater than 125 km/h. Happy driving!

We captured a sudden deceleration, hopefully your journey was a safe one. During hard deceleration your car\'s braking system, suspension and related systems are under additional stress. This can lead to premature breakdown of your rotors, pads and other parts.

Your Pitstop device has detected a sudden change in your car\'s motion which suggests you made a quick lane change. If you just avoided a family of baby ducks, we all thank you but we always want to make sure you are safe on your journey.
When you leave your car, just do a quick check to see if you\'ve left any electronics on that could drain the battery over time
Next time you\'re waiting in your car, just turn the engine off and let your car relax for a bit.
If you feel tired and/or sleepy, take a break and relax, or hand over the wheel to a buddy. Happy road tripping!
Leave about 1.5 car lengths between you and that driver ahead, that way your ninja reflexes have time to activate and bring your car to a smooth stop.

Once a day we check the average fuel price based on your location. If the value isn\'t found, we use the value of $1.09 as we found this to be the average fuel price this year. We will eventually be adding in capability for you to enter your own price so you can track your fuel more accurately.
I can\'t turn my car on right now
Enter the last 6 digits found on your Pitstop device
